Nightlight::

"I guess that he hadn't that intention"replied Nightlight"Sadly we're 
in war against the predacons... But these moments of break and 
relaxing with you make up for those bad moments..."





--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: It seems that there is no break for us soldiers. We 
tried to have a nice romantic dinner and some bot just has to choose 
that time to go insane...
> 
> Rodimus was thinking about how relaxing it was to just be with 
someone so beautifull. He was handaling the pressure of command much 
better then he did while commanding the Autobots but it was still 
hard. Nightlight provided a nice break from his job.
